content: face frame hat by pricilla brooks materials 5mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors approximately 110-150 yards worsted weight yarn special stitches treble half_double_crochet thdc yarn over twice insert your hook in the indicated stitch yarn over and pull up a loop yarn over and pull through 2 loops yarn over and pull through the last 3 loops on your hook treble half_double_crochet through the third loop thdctl yarn over twice insert your hook in the third loop of the stitch from the previous row yarn over and pull up a loop yarn over and pull through 2 loops yarn over and pull through the last 3 loops on your hook half_double_crochet through the third loop hdctl yarn over insert your hook in the third loop of the stitch from the previous row yarn over and pull up a loop yarn over and pull through all 3 loops on your hook special notes chain 1 does not count as a stitch this is a snug fitting/ fashion hat but if you want a larger size you can go up a hook size or keep in pattern while adding another round of increases abbreviations chain-chain round- round stitch es - st sts slip_stitch- slip_stitch yarn over - yo treble half_double_crochet through the third loop - thdctl treble half_double_crochet - thdc half double crochet through the third loop - hdctl directions round 1 make an magic_ring ch1 make 12 thdc in the ring close the ring slip_stitch in the ch1 round 2 chain 1 2thdctl in each st around slip_stitch in the chain 1 = 24 thdctl round 3 chain 1 2thdctl in the first st 1 thdctl in the next st around slip_stitch in the chain 1 = 36 thdctl round 4 chain 1 2thdctl in the first st thdctl in the next 2 sts around slip_stitch in the chain 1 = 48 thdctl round 5 chain 1 2thdctl in the first st thdctl in the next 3 sts around slip_stitch in the chain 1 = 60 thdctl round 6 chain 1 thdctl in each st around slip_stitch in the ch1 round 7 chain 1 thdctl in the first 29 thdctl 9 thdctl in the next st thdctl in the last 30 thdctl slip_stitch in the chain 1 = 68 thdctl round 8 chain 1 thdctl in the first 33 thdctl 7 thdctl in the next st thdctl in the last 34 thdctl slip_stitch in the chain 1 = 74 thdct round 9 chain 1 thdctl in the first 36 thdctl 5 thdctl in the next st thdctl in the last 37 thdctl slip_stitch in the chain 1 = 78 thdctl round 10 ch1 thdctl in each st around slip_stitch in the ch1 round 11-12 chain 1 hdctl in each st around slip_stitch in the chain 1 you may add more row of this if you want the hat to be longer finish off cut your yarn remove any stitch markers and weave in your ends
